name: fftpeg
description: Modern TUI for ffmpeg video processing operations
long_description: A powerful dual-mode tool that makes video processing with ffmpeg accessible and visual. Use the interactive TUI for browsing and exploring, or the CLI for scripting and quick operations.

name: AI Hub
description: Unified management system for AI CLI tools
long_description: A unified management system for AI CLI tools with beautiful TUI, shared model storage, and CLI orchestration for chaining AI workflows.

name: btop
description: Resource monitor showing CPU, RAM, disk, network
long_description: A monitor of resources with a fancy and customizable interface. Shows usage and stats for processor, memory, disks, network and processes.

name: lazygit
description: Simple terminal UI for git commands
long_description: A simple terminal UI for git commands, written in Go with the gocui library. Lazygit is a keyboard-driven git client that makes version control intuitive.

name: htop
long_description: An interactive process viewer for Unix systems. It is a text-mode application and requires ncurses.

name: ranger
long_description: A VIM-inspired filemanager for the console. It comes with rifle, a file launcher that is good at automatically finding out which program to use for what file type.

name: ncdu
long_description: A disk usage analyzer with an ncurses interface. It is designed to find space hogs on a remote server where you don't have an entire graphical setup available.
